lines.text:
[looking at a fluroscope of Freddie's insides]
A marble, two buttons, a safety pin...
I lost a tie clasp two years ago, see if that's in there.
I overheard Doctor Zoomer say he needed a couple of men to accompany his mummy back to the States.
Is she afraid to travel by herself?
She? No, Lou. This mummy is a he. What's wrong with that? Some mummies are men, some mummies are women.
Such a strange country.
What's strange about it Lou?
Your mummy, your mummy. Wasn't she a woman?
I never had a mummy.
What did your Father do? Win you in a crap game?
What's the matter?
I thought you were gonna slap me!
How stupid can you get?
How stupid do you want me to be?
Ask Klaris, he's the one that got us into this.
And he's going to get us out of it.
Flowers?

[points to one bunch of flowers]
How much are these?
A dollar.

[points to another bunch]
How much are these?
A dollar.
I got no money.
[throws a bouquet back on the tray]
No money?
[picks up the bunch he threw back]
They're a little wilted, you can have them for nothing.

[finding Professor Zoomer's body dressed in his long underwear]
Is this the body you found earlier?
Yeah, but before he had clothes on.
A waiter will be with you in a moment.
Hey! The meat's on fire!
[throws a glass of water at the kabob but hits Abbott instead]
Where will we find the Mummy?
Don't worry. the Mummy will find you!
There is no curse that a gun or a knife can't cure.
